reasoning: Kawasaki disease is an acute vasculitis primarily affecting children <5 years. Global incidence varies significantly by region: ~4-8 per 100k in Japan, ~1-2 per 100k in other developed countries. Weighted global average approximately 4.8 per 100k in affected pediatric populations. Incidence metric appropriate for acute condition with defined diagnosis.
source: WHO and pediatric epidemiology studies on Kawasaki disease
